sections.name: Quick Tour
sections.description: A simple tour of the library. This section does not document setting up your environment or tooling or anything like that. All examples come with links to JSFiddle.

sections.name: Getting Started
sections.description: A full tutorial on setting up Tweed using the CLI, and the process of developing, building, and deploying applications. WIP.

sections.name: Patterns
sections.description: A compilation of design patterns and architectural approaches to building Tweed applications to keep them clean, decoupled, and testable. WIP.

sections.name: Philosophy
sections.description: An in depth discussion of why Tweed exists and what problem it aims to solve. Also, this series discusses some ideas about the architecture of a Tweed app. WIP.
